title: Candy on the Table, an Eye on the Exit: Poll Workers Run a Tense Election Day
description: Uncertainty rippled beneath the bustling energy as volunteers readied to face voters, monitors and America’s anxious mood. “I hope they don’t punch me out,” one worker said.
media:credit: Alisha Jucevic for The New York Times
media:description: From left, Terri Thiem, Brittany Montague and Mike Milich setting up voting booths in Flagstaff, Ariz.
